languages.text: {n}Нахмурившись, Паскаль мрачно изрекает:{/n} "Фиксирую богохуль... Проклятье, мирянин, этот благословенный дым должен окуривать священные машины, а не твои легкие". {n}Затем техножрец умолкает, прислушивается и с удивлением произносит:{/n} "Эта примитивная мелодия... Это — язык. Наш язык. Разновидность ритмического техножаргона, смысл которого образуется из длительности пауз между сигналами".

{n}Pasqal frowns and says darkly,{/n} "I am registering a Categ— blast it, layman, this blessed smoke is meant for the sacred machines, not your lungs." {n}Then the Tech-Priest falls silent and listens carefully, before uttering in astonishment,{/n} "This primitive melody... is a language. Our language. A variety of rhythm-based tech-vernacular in which meaning is created by the lengths of pauses between the signals."
languages.original_text: {n}Нахмурившись, Паскаль мрачно изрекает:{/n} "Фиксирую богохуль... Проклятье, мирянин, этот благословенный дым должен окуривать священные машины, а не твои легкие". {n}Затем техножрец умолкает, прислушивается и с удивлением произносит:{/n} "Эта примитивная мелодия... Это — язык. Наш язык. Разновидность ритмического техножаргона, смысл которого образуется из длительности пауз между сигналами".

Our language. A variety of rhythm-based tech-vernacular in which meaning is created by the lengths of pauses between the signals."

languages.text: {n}パスカルは顔をしかめて暗い声で話す。{/n}「カテゴ…爆発させよ、俗人。この恩寵受けし煙は聖なる機械のものであり、お前の肺に入れるものではない」{n}それから技術司祭は黙り込んで注意深く耳を傾ける。そして、驚きの声を発した。{/n}「この原始的な旋律は…言語です。我々の言語です。信号と信号の間の長さで意味を成す、リズムを基調とする多様な技術言語」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal frowns and says darkly,{/n} "I am registering a Categ— blast it, layman, this blessed smoke is meant for the sacred machines, not your lungs." {n}Then the Tech-Priest falls silent and listens carefully, before uttering in astonishment,{/n} "This primitive melody... is a language. Our language. A variety of rhythm-based tech-vernacular in which meaning is created by the lengths of pauses between the signals."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは顔をしかめて暗い声で話す。{/n}「カテゴ…爆発させよ、俗人。この恩寵受けし煙は聖なる機械のものであり、お前の肺に入れるものではない」{n}それから技術司祭は黙り込んで注意深く耳を傾ける。そして、驚きの声を発した。{/n}「この原始的な旋律は…言語です。我々の言語です。信号と信号の間の長さで意味を成す、リズムを基調とする多様な技術言語」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡皱着眉头，阴沉地开了口。{/n}“检测到第——该死，外行人。这受祝福的烟雾是供给神圣机器的，不是用来给你的肺呼吸的。”{n}随后，帕斯卡陷入了沉默，仔细地聆听着，之后惊讶地说道。{/n}“这首原始的旋律……是某种语言。我们的语言。以节奏为基础的技术术语，含义由信号之间停顿的长度来决定。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal frowns and says darkly,{/n} "I am registering a Categ— blast it, layman, this blessed smoke is meant for the sacred machines, not your lungs." {n}Then the Tech-Priest falls silent and listens carefully, before uttering in astonishment,{/n} "This primitive melody... is a language. Our language. A variety of rhythm-based tech-vernacular in which meaning is created by the lengths of pauses between the signals."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡皱着眉头，阴沉地开了口。{/n}“我正在登记第——该死，外行人。这受祝福的烟雾是供给神圣机器的，不是用来给你的肺呼吸的。”{n}随后，帕斯卡陷入了沉默，仔细地聆听着，之后惊讶地说道。{/n}“这首原始的旋律……是某种语言。我们的语言。以节奏为基础的技术术语，含义由信号之间停顿的长度来决定。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Détection d'une hérésie de catég... {n}commence Pasqal avant de s'interrompre en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Bon sang, profane, cette fumée bénie est destinée aux machines sacrées, pas à vos poumons. »{n}Soudain, le technoprêtre se tait et tend l'oreille, ébahi.{/n} « Cette mélodie primitive... est un langage. Notre langage. Une variété de technojargon basé sur le rythme et dont le sens est déterminé par la durée des pauses entre les signaux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal frowns and says darkly,{/n} "I am registering a Categ— blast it, layman, this blessed smoke is meant for the sacred machines, not your lungs." {n}Then the Tech-Priest falls silent and listens carefully, before uttering in astonishment,{/n} "This primitive melody... is a language. Our language. A variety of rhythm-based tech-vernacular in which meaning is created by the lengths of pauses between the signals."

traits.locale_text: « Détection d'une hérésie de catég... {n}commence Pasqal avant de s'interrompre en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Bon sang, profane, cette fumée bénie est destinée aux machines sacrées, pas à vos poumons. »{n}Soudain, le technoprêtre se tait et tend l'oreille, ébahi.{/n} « Cette mélodie primitive... est un langage. Notre langage. Une variété de technojargon basé sur le rythme et dont le sens est déterminé par la durée des pauses entre les signaux. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal frunce el ceño y dice sombríamente:{/n} «Detecto una herejía de categ... Rayos, profano, ese humo bendito es para las máquinas sagradas, no tus pulmones». {n}Luego el tecnosacerdote se queda en silencio y escucha con atención. A continuación, dice, atónito:{/n} «Esta melodía primitiva... es un idioma. Nuestro idioma. Es una mezcla de términos de tecnojerga basados en el ritmo cuyo significado se descifra por la duración de las pausas entre señales».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal frowns and says darkly,{/n} "I am registering a Categ— blast it, layman, this blessed smoke is meant for the sacred machines, not your lungs." {n}Then the Tech-Priest falls silent and listens carefully, before uttering in astonishment,{/n} "This primitive melody... is a language. Our language. A variety of rhythm-based tech-vernacular in which meaning is created by the lengths of pauses between the signals."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal frunce el ceño y dice sombríamente:{/n} «Detecto una herejía de categ... Rayos, profano, ese humo bendito es para las máquinas sagradas, no tus pulmones». {n}Luego el tecnosacerdote se queda en silencio y escucha con atención. A continuación, dice, atónito:{/n} «Esta melodía primitiva... es un idioma. Nuestro idioma. Es una mezcla de términos de tecnojerga basados en el ritmo cuyo significado se descifra por la duración de las pausas entre señales».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal runzelt die Stirn und sagt in finsterem Ton:{/n} "Ich registriere Ketzerei der Kateg- Verflucht, Laie, dieser gesegnete Rauch ist für die heiligen Maschinen bestimmt, nicht für Eure Lungen." {n}Dann verstummt der Techpriester und lauscht angestrengt, bevor er erstaunt ausruft:{/n} "Diese primitive Melodie ... ist eine Sprache. Unsere Sprache. Eine Variante der rhythmusbasierten Tech-Sprache, bei der die Bedeutung durch die Länge der Pausen zwischen den Signalen entsteht."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal frowns and says darkly,{/n} "I am registering a Categ— blast it, layman, this blessed smoke is meant for the sacred machines, not your lungs." {n}Then the Tech-Priest falls silent and listens carefully, before uttering in astonishment,{/n} "This primitive melody... is a language. Our language. A variety of rhythm-based tech-vernacular in which meaning is created by the lengths of pauses between the signals."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal runzelt die Stirn und sagt in finsterem Ton:{/n} "Ich registriere Ketzerei der Kateg- Verflucht, Laie, dieser gesegnete Rauch ist für die heiligen Maschinen bestimmt, nicht für Eure Lungen." {n}Dann verstummt der Techpriester und lauscht angestrengt, bevor er erstaunt ausruft:{/n} "Diese primitive Melodie ... ist eine Sprache. Unsere Sprache. Eine Variante der rhythmusbasierten Tech-Sprache, bei der die Bedeutung durch die Länge der Pausen zwischen den Signalen entsteht."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, kaşlarını çatıp canı sıkkınca konuşuyor.{/n} "Katego... Kes şunu avam. Bu kutsanmış duman; senin ciğerlerin için değil, kutsal makineler içindir." {n}Sessizliğe gömülüp dikkatle dinlemeye başlayan Tekno Rahip, bir noktada duyduğu hayreti dile getiriyor.{/n} "Bu ilkel melodi bir lisandır. Bizim lisanımız. Anlamı sinyaller arasındaki uzun duraksamalar ile yaratılan, ritim tabanlı bir tekno lehçe çeşidi."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal frowns and says darkly,{/n} "I am registering a Categ— blast it, layman, this blessed smoke is meant for the sacred machines, not your lungs." {n}Then the Tech-Priest falls silent and listens carefully, before uttering in astonishment,{/n} "This primitive melody... is a language. Our language. A variety of rhythm-based tech-vernacular in which meaning is created by the lengths of pauses between the signals."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal kaşlarını çatıyor ve canı sıkılmış bir şekilde konuşuyor:{/n} "Katego... Kes şunu seni avam, bu kutsanmış duman kutsal makineler içindir, senin ciğerlerin için değil." {n}Ardından Tekno Rahip sessizliğe gömülüyor ve dikkatle dinlemeye başlıyor, sonrasında da duyduğu hayreti dile getiriyor:{/n} "Bu ilkel melodi bir... Lisan. Bizim lisanımız. Anlamı sinyaller arasındaki uzun duraksamalar ile yaratılan, ritm tabanlı bir tekno lehçe çeşidi."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
